name: Snorb's Dungeon Crawl
description:
After a grueling ten months, here it is! Snorb's Dungeon Crawl, a (hopefully) fun little dungeon crawler for ZZT!

Move around with the arrows, and hold Shift and hit an arrow to shoot.

Extra-special thanks to WiL (stale-meme-emporium) for last-minute late night tech support getting the Itch version up and running!
